articles.description: Sinovac Biotech's experimental COVID-19 vaccine CoronaVac triggered a quick immune response but the level of antibodies produced was lower than in people who had recovered from the disease, preliminary trial results showed on Wednesday.
articles.content:
* Sinovac releases results from Phase I/II vaccine trials
* Sinovacs CoronaVac appears safe and well tolerated
* Late-stage trials to determine vaccine efficacy ongoing
